  • Updates

UpdatesÔÉÅ

System updates are delivered in form of zipped archives and can be installed in a very simple and elegant way. Once you have a working installation of DuCollage Micro Blogging System on your server, you do not need access to your servers management panel in order to install future updates and themes.

Updates management requires you to be looged in as an admin.

To install an update after downloading the archive, make sure you set your servers upload_max_filesize to a very high value, we recommend 150M and above, log in to your Admin account and point your web browser to http://yourdomain.com/admin/updates where yourdomain.com is your actual domain name or click on Updates on the admin dashboard.

Click on Upload Update File and wait for the upload to complete, then click on Install. The process is automated and simple.
